item.description: Scleral lenses have revolutionized the world of vision correction, offering comfort and clarity to individuals with a variety of eye conditions.

item.title: Five Surprising Things That Can Trigger Keratoconus
item.description: Article about conditions that can cause keratoconus. Introduction If you have keratoconus, it's important to learn what factors can trigger the condition.

item.title: Innovations in Keratoconus Treatment
item.description: Keratoconus is characterized by corneal thinning that results in distortion and loss of vision.

item.description: Covid eye care In December 2019, a novel coronavirus strain (SARS-CoV-2) emerged in the city of Wuhan, China.

item.title: about keratoconus-little know facts
item.description: About Keratoconus When you say you have keratoconus people just look amazed at you because they don’t have an idea what are you talking about.

item.title: What is keratoconus
item.description: What is keratoconus? Keratoconus is basically a conical cornea. The cornea is a lens that focuses the light from our environment into the retina in the back of your eyes.

item.title: keratoconus overview
item.description: Keratoconus overview Keratoconus from Greek: kerato (horn, cornea), and konos cone.

item.title: How to create a contacts routine
item.description: “Good habits are hard to form but are easy to live with, bad habits are easy to form but are hard to live with”

item.title: Contact Lenses for Keratoconus
item.description: Contact lenses for keratoconus There are “basically” three types of lenses, corneal lenses like the Rose K lenses; scleral lenses like the Digiform K lens, and Hybrid lenses like the Synergeyes lens.

item.title: Corneal tomography interpretation
item.description: Corneal tomography Tomography derives from the Greek words tomos (to cut) and graphein (to write).

item.title: Do you have keratoconus?
item.description: Do you have keratoconus? The first time you realize you have visual problems is at school, you just can’t see clearly from behind the classroom, so you have to sit closer to the blackboard.

item.title: Causes of keratoconus
item.description: Causes of Keratoconus First, there may be many causes of keratoconus that are not known to us.

item.title: Top 7 things to do if you have Keratoconus
item.description: Keratoconus what to do? Your main objective must be to have an adequate vision for your life needs (study, job, fun).
